thread.title: B.C. protesters want apology from NHL defenceman who killed grizzly bear
thread.title_full: B.C. protesters want apology from NHL defenceman who killed grizzly bear

title: B.C. protesters want apology from NHL defenceman who killed grizzly bear
text:
British Columbia Members and supporters of a group against illegal poaching and hunting gather outside B.C. Provincial Court before Anaheim Ducks' defenceman Clayton Stoner's first court appearance, in Vancouver, B.C., on Friday October 9, 2015. Stoner is charged with five counts under the Wildlife Act after a grizzly bear was killed on the central coast in 2013. (DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) Members and supporters of a group against illegal poaching and hunting gather outside B.C. Provincial Court before Anaheim Ducks' defenceman Clayton Stoner's first court appearance, in Vancouver, B.C., on Friday October 9, 2015. Stoner is charged with five counts under the Wildlife Act after a grizzly bear was killed on the central coast in 2013.(DARRYL DYCK/THE CANADIAN PRESS) B.C. protesters want apology from NHL defenceman who killed grizzly bear Add to ...
